page.title: 19Family Leisure In Newport
page.content: {My Mummy goes to Flower Club. They make bouquets of Flowers. She puts Flowers in a basket and makes pretty Arrangements. {I am in Newport Legionnaies Jazz Band. I am the Mascot and I hold the Mace. We have a Kazoo and drum section and I have Won 8 Medals. I wear a Red, Blue and Gold costume. {I Go to Choir}and I wear a Red cloak and a Ruff. I sing at Weddings and I get Â£1. I like to go to Choir it is in Church and we sit at the front. {I Go to the B.M.X Coures.}It's down Vineyard Road and there are lots of jumps and bumps. One of the bumps is called the Camal and one is the Table Top. I can do Wheelies. {My Hobby is Judo.}it is a Japanese Sport and we learn the techniques of throwing opponents. The throws all have Japanese Names.
